definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on

sentences.english: That is Tim's stack of tin thumbtacks.
sentences.chinese: 那是蒂姆一堆錫制的圖釘。

sentences.english: Thumbtacks anchor a colorful Picasso print to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一副畢加索的畫用圖釘釘在牆上。

sentences.english: It sells thousands of push-pins all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 公司在全世界銷售數以千計的圖釘。

sentences.english: There is a push-pin holding up this piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 這裏正有一枚圖釘釘着一張紙。

sentences.english: I press the thumbtack into the board with thumb.
sentences.chinese: 我用大拇指將圖釘按在木板上。

sentences.english: He thumbtacked the picture of landscape to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他用圖釘把那張風景畫釘在牆上。

sentences.english: A bright yellow pencil, a blue thumbtack;
sentences.chinese: 黃色鉛筆立得高，藍色圖釘有妙用。

sentences.english: You can push the pin in with your thumb.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用大拇指把圖釘按進去。

sentences.english: And he had tracked their movements with pins on maps.
sentences.chinese: 而且用圖釘在地圖上標註跟蹤它們的動向。

sentences.english: I worry that Microsoft is introducing Thumbtack at a bad time.
sentences.chinese: 我擔心，微軟推出了圖釘在一個壞的時間。

sentences.english: The solution is to use the box as a candleholder and fix it to the wall with the pins.
sentences.chinese: 粘貼方法是把盒子作爲燭臺，用圖釘將它釘到牆上。

sentences.english: The thumb stud is inlayed with a ruby.
sentences.chinese: 拇指圖釘與一塊紅寶石一起嵌入。

sentences.english: He affixed the picture to the wall with a thumbtack.
sentences.chinese: 他用圖釘把圖片釘到牆上。
